trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> 의 컬렉션을 반복 하는 클래스 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션을 사용 하 여 개체에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> 속성 또는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> 클래스를 확장 하는 사용자 지정 형식 만들에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> 클래스를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 앞의 예제에서 사용 되는 구성 파일의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be added.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be added.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 메서드는 지정 된 추가 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> 경우 포함 되지 않으므로 이미 컬렉션 내에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Clear%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the object to.
The index location at which to begin copying.
Copies this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object to an array.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The length of <paramref name="array" /> is less than the value of <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Count" /> plus <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" />의 길이가 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Count" />와 <paramref name="index" />의 합보다 작은 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 섹션 그룹 수를 나타내는 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object from the collection
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object from the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object with the specified name.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Get%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Get%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is null or an empty string ("").
Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체를 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 개체를 반복하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 반환될 키가 있는 섹션 그룹의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 개체에 있는 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체의 키를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetKey%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object.
The applicable <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object.
Used by the system during serialization.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetObjectData%2A> method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetObjectData%2A> 메서드는 직렬화 하는 동안 사용 됩니다; 구성 파일에 구성 데이터를 지속할 때, 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 개체에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> property to iterate through a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> 속성을 반복 하는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose index is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정된 인덱스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> class.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose name is specified from the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object with the specified name.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> class.
The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> objects contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" />에개체에 있는 모든 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체에 대한 키를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection" /> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션에 있는 모든 섹션 그룹의 이름을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Keys%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the section group to be removed.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose name is specified from this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 개체에서 지정된 이름의 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체를 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group to be removed.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose index is specified from this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 개체에서 지정된 인덱스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 개체를 제거합니다.
